item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, February 24, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Introduction to Stochastic Calculus (161 points | 30 comments)
2. Show HN: I built an app to stop me doomscrolling by touching grass (647 points | 176 comments)
3. Apple says it will add 20k jobs, spend $500B, produce AI servers in US (244 points | 235 comments)
4. Right to Repair laws have now been introduced in all 50 us states (120 points | 22 comments)
5. Launch HN: SubImage (YC W25) – See your infra from an attacker's perspective (29 points | 12 comments)
6. Is this the simplest (and most surprising) sorting algorithm ever? (2021) (25 points | 24 comments)
7. Neut Programming Language (27 points | 7 comments)
8. Laravel Cloud (85 points | 50 comments)
9. Ashby (YC W19) Is Hiring Principal Product Engineers ( | hide)
10. Parents favor daughters: A meta-analysis of predictors of differential treatment (22 points | 4 comments)
11. AI cracks superbug problem in two days that took scientists years (58 points | 23 comments)
12. AI-designed chips are so weird that 'humans cannot understand them' (343 points | 229 comments)
13. Why does target="_blank" have an underscore in front? (2024) (183 points | 136 comments)
14. Breaking into apartment buildings in five minutes on my phone (88 points | 56 comments)
15. Larry Ellison's half-billion-dollar quest to change farming (66 points | 99 comments)
16. The Wrongs of Thomas More (Wrong 5) (42 points | 23 comments)
17. The Champion Who Memorized 80 Numbers in 13.5 Seconds (6 points | discuss)
18. ARPA is funding cheap community-owned gigabit fiber to neglected neighborhoods (88 points | 76 comments)
19. MKWS – Simple Static Site Generator (10 points | 2 comments)
20. Show HN: I scrape Steam data every month and it's yours to download for free (130 points | 49 comments)
21. The DOS 3.3 Sys.com Bug Hunt (39 points | 14 comments)
22. Microsoft cancels leases for AI data centers, analyst says (225 points | 201 comments)
23. DeepSeek Open Source FlashMLA – MLA Decoding Kernel for Hopper GPUs (374 points | 101 comments)
24. MongoDB acquires Voyage AI (51 points | 49 comments)
25. Show HN: Bracket City – A daily, exploded (?) crossword puzzle (13 points | 8 comments)
26. Making any integer with four 2s (329 points | 142 comments)
27. My startup journey with BYBE (5 points | 3 comments)
28. On Zero Sum Games (The Informational Meta-Game) (33 points | 18 comments)
29. Show HN: RadiaCode – Python Library for RadiaCode-10x Radiation Detectors (33 points | 6 comments)
30. Show HN: Jq-Like Tool for Markdown (295 points | 67 comments)
